fullText: While 'The Heart of Rock and Roll' boasts an undeniably talented cast and a nostalgic soundtrack that will have audiences singing along, the musical struggles to find its own rhythm beyond the familiar beats of its predecessor.
dtliExcerpt: While 'The Heart of Rock and Roll' boasts an undeniably talented cast and a nostalgic soundtrack that will have audiences singing along, the musical struggles to find its own rhythm beyond the familiar beats of its predecessor.
